thread.title: Oil prices won't go much higher, says David Spika

title: Oil prices won't go much higher, says David Spika
text:
Oil prices won't go much higher, says David Spika 3:03pm EDT - 04:25
GuideStone Capital Management's president tells Reuters' Fred Katayama why he thinks the oil rally may soon run its course. He also advises investors nearing retirement to lower their risk exposure without flocking to bonds. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
GuideStone Capital Management's president tells Reuters' Fred Katayama why he thinks the oil rally may soon run its course. He also advises investors nearing retirement to lower their risk exposure without flocking to bonds.
